amendment.description: Amendment replaced language in the bill concerning decisions to disapprove the expenditure of funds for Everglades Restoration with language that provides for Congressional input in such decision making.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to ensure availability of funds in the bill for the Everglades National Park Project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Diaz-Balart, M. amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Diaz-Balart, M..
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Diaz-Balart, M..
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Diaz-Balart, M. amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
